subject: p13475033
History: History: M with dyspnea, pedal edema, ESRD on HD, Eval for acute process, attn to CHF.
Findings: Diffuse increase in interstitial markings as well as pulmonary vessel engorgement are suggestive of moderate to severe pulmonary edema. Cardiac silhouette is moderately enlarged. There is no pleural effusion or pneumothorax.
